description: Tomoya`s friend and also a delinquent. He entered the school on an athletic recommendation in football, but was kicked out of the football club after being involved in a fight. After this incident, he became lazy, becoming the only student with a higher absence rate than Tomoya. He and Tomoya are known as the "Dirty Pair" in school. He has a sister named Mei. Youhei is basically a comic relief character, and his most notable punishment he receives includes him getting bullied and attacked by Tomoya and Kyou, beaten to a pulp by Tomoyo for trying to assault her, and getting attacked by the Rugby Team Members for various unfortunate events involving them.
name: Sunohara Youhei
